trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Withering Aura
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the wurm must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage, and gains one {@link level of withering|https://5etools-mirror-2.github.io/adventure.html#DoDk,12}.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The wurm can't be affected or detected by cantrips unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Breach
entries: The wurm utilises its full movement. While doing so, it can enter medium or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the wurm enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed to the side of the wurm's space. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage, and is pushed 10 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. After finishing its move, the wurm can make one bite attack against a {@condition prone} target as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. Additionally the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature gains one {@link level of withering|https://5etools-mirror-2.github.io/adventure.html#DoDk,12}.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When the imp is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
This trait is active only while the imp is doping.

trait.name: Slippery Movement
entries: The imp does not trigger opportunity attacks.
This trait is active only while the imp is doping.

action.name: Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, or {@hit 12} while doping, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}The imp takes 6 ({@dice 1d8 + 2}) coins from the target. The imp will go after gold if able, but will take other coins if not.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, or {@hit 12} while doping, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Gold Doping
entries: The imp eats a gold coin, digesting it with its unique constitution to give itself a boost of energy. This boost doubles the imps Dexterity, and triples its speed. This boost lasts for 3 rounds. When this boost ends the imp becomes {@condition stunned} for 1 round, and falls {@condition prone}.
